20110102015814.000|20110102015815.000|CC1|HOW MUCH PUNISHMENT EACH MAN    
20110102015815.000|20110102015816.000|CC1|COULD SUSTAIN.

20110102015819.000|20110102015820.000|CC1|STARK DIFFERENCES IN PERSONALITY

20110102015825.000|20110102015827.000|CC1|AND THAT SORT OF CONTRAST WAS   
20110102015827.000|20110102015829.000|CC1|ALSO PART OF THE GREAT TENNIS   
20110102015829.000|20110102015830.000|CC1|RIVALRY BETWEEN BRASH HOT       
20110102015830.000|20110102015834.000|CC1|TEMPERED JOHN McENROE AND COOL, 
20110102015834.000|20110102015838.000|CC1|EVEN ICY BJORN BORG.

20110102015839.000|20110102015841.000|CC1|THE PROFILE OF AN ENTIRE SPORT. 
20110102015841.000|20110102015845.000|CC1|IN THE 1960s, ARNOLD PALMER AND 
20110102015845.000|20110102015851.000|CC1|JACK NICKLAS STAGED A SERIES OF 
20110102015851.000|20110102015853.000|CC1|MEMORABLE DUELS THAT CAPTIVATED 
20110102015853.000|20110102015855.000|CC1|VIEWERS AS THE CENTURIES-OLD    
20110102015855.000|20110102015901.000|CC1|GAME ENTERED THE TELEVISION AGE.
20110102015901.000|20110102015904.000|CC1|TWO DECADES LATER, LARRY BIRD   
20110102015904.000|20110102015905.000|CC1|AND MAGIC JOHNSON BEGAN THEIR   
20110102015905.000|20110102015910.000|CC1|RIVALRY AT THE 1979 NCAA FINALS,

20110102015915.000|20110102015915.000|CC1|HEIGHTS, MEETING THREE TIMES IN 
20110102015915.000|20110102015918.000|CC1|THE NBA FINALS.
